feed.title: Mike Drakos
feed.subtitle: A portfolio website for Mike Drakos

entry.title: Update Post OMG!
entry.content:
This website was created for CPSC 300 Software Engineering at UNBC. After playing around with jekyll for a few hours I am starting to see the potential and I’m looking forward to working more with it.

Hopefully I can say up to date with projects I push to my personal github and leave my thoughts as I work away at them!
entry.summary: This website was created for CPSC 300 Software Engineering at UNBC. After playing around with jekyll for a few hours I am starting to see the potential and I’m looking forward to working more with it.
